title: Maccaption Enterprise
description:
Name: MacCaption Enterprise
Version: - 6.0

Mac Platform: Intel
Includes: KG

OS version: 10.6 or higher

Link for more information: http://www.telestream.net/captioning/overview.htm



MacCaption is a new improved version of CCaptionPro. Not only you can import text file and break it into individual captions, you can also format the text by clicking on a couple of icons. Many icons have been added to access each function much faster. It cuts down caption preparation time to 1/3rd the time it takes with the old CCaptionPro. For a screen shot of MacCaption click here. Online help screen is just a click away.

You do not need:

A separate caption preparation software
A closed caption encoder

For your complete caption work directly on your hard drive you need just one software - MacCaption. Period

Whats new:

Change log not available at time of posting

Install:

Install app.
Open keygen and activate, this will generate the sn and activation key.
You will need to enter the sn first.
Block with LS/Hands off or firewall.
Then choose offline activation and enter activation key supplied by keygen

Courtesy of C.O.R.E

If anyone is wondering this progaem can put subtitles on iPod classic and in Color but I haven't fully gotten the to work PLESSE post in the comments If you find a way to put subtitles on iPod classic!!!!

P.S. THIS program costs $10,000 NO JOKE
